setting.display_unlock_icon: Display unlock icon next to Tag name

setting.display_protected_tag_from_tags_page: Display Protected Tag in Tags page navigation

tag_password_required.title: Password required to view discussions in this tag

tag_group_required.title: Permission Group is required to view discussions in this tag

info.password_protected: To be able to gain access to this discussion, you must provide the correct password for the Protected Tag.
info.group_protected: To be able to gain access to this discussion, you must have the correct role assigned to your account.
info.multiple: To be able to gain access to this discussion, you need to unlock all protected Tags.

title.group_protected: Post in Permission Group Required Discussion

info.password_protected: To be able to gain access to this post, you must provide the correct password for the Protected Tag.
info.group_protected: To be able to gain access to this post, you must have the correct role assigned to your account.
info.multiple: To be able to gain access to this post, you need to unlock all protected Tags.
